Research

Home

I am an associate professor of mathematics at the University of Wisconsin - Parkside. This semester, I am teaching Math 114 (College Algbra II with Trigonometry), Math 301 (Linear Algebra), and Math 310 (Advanced Probability and Statistics). My research interests are algebraic geometry, representation theory, and combinatorics.

kreiman@uwp.edu
